data.text:
About Proxima Film

Proxima Film is a London-based production company founded in 2019 by Ander Da Silva with the aim of creating premium video content that compels its audience to share it.

Producing branded video content across a range of sectors, our passion is to craft innovative and relatable content for all social media channels. By combining our expertise with fresh new ideas we can optimise video engagement and add cutting-edge elements to any brand.

Experienced in every aspect of film-making, our team will manage the entire production process from conception to delivery - with an intimate understanding of what it takes to make exceptional digital video and outstanding social content.

We pride ourselves on our commitment to excellence and the delivery of first-class projects aligned with our clientsâ values - on brand, on message, and on budget. Invested in telling your story, we work closely with you to find the right approach for your business to reach your audience.

Rapidly earning its place as a dynamic and respectable UK production company, Proxima Film believes in building a culturally diverse and inclusive environment for ourselves and our clients.
